DOC.brief_summary: The investigator aim develop , pilot evaluate new `` Total Lifestyle Coaching '' ( TLC ) program , address information behavior-change aspect nutrition education patient whose body mass index ( BMI ) exceed 25 .
DOC.brief_title: Total Lifestyle Coaching Pilot Study ( TLC )
DOC.detailed_description: This single-arm pilot study patient Revere Healthcare Center BMI great 25 . The intervention consist single in-person assessment dietician follow telephone coaching session address nutrition , sleep , stress-reduction skill , physical activity course 6 month . Study team assess anthropomorphic , demographic , behavioral measure prior initial dietician assessment study completion ( 6 month follow enrollment ) . Semi-structured exit interview assess participant ' experience program also conduct follow program completion .
DOC.criteria: 1. age 21 old 2. body mass index ( BMI ) exceed 25 3. speaks English 4. access telephone 5. able come MGHRevere health center least four facetoface meeting six month period . 6. overweight ( BMI exceed 25 )
